function createEvent(string calldata eventId, uint256 numFights, uint256 seasonId, uint256 defaultBoostCutoff) external
function depositBonus(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId, uint256 amount, bool force) external

function submitFightResult(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId, uint8 winner, uint8 method, uint256 pointsForWinner, uint256 pointsForWinnerMethod, uint256 sumWinnersStakes, uint256 winningPoolTotalShares) external

function submitFightResults(string calldata eventId, tuple(uint256 fightId, uint8 winner, uint8 method, uint256 pointsForWinner, uint256 pointsForWinnerMethod, uint256 sumWinnersStakes, uint256 winningPoolTotalShares)[] inputs) external
function setEventBoostCutoff(string calldata eventId, uint256 cutoff) external
function setFightBoostCutoff(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId, uint256 cutoff) external
function setMinBoostAmount(uint256 newMin) external
function setMaxFightsPerEvent(uint256 newMax) external
function setMaxBonusDeposit(uint256 newMax) external
function setEventClaimDeadline(string calldata eventId, uint256 deadline) external
function setEventClaimReady(string calldata eventId, bool claimReady) external
function updateFightStatus(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId, uint8 newStatus) external
function cancelFight(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId) external
function purgeEvent(string calldata eventId, address recipient) external
function getEvent(string calldata eventId) external view returns (uint256 seasonId, uint256 numFights, bool exists, bool claimReady)
function getEventClaimDeadline(string calldata eventId) external view returns (uint256)
function isEventClaimReady(string calldata eventId) external view returns (bool)
function getEventFights(string calldata eventId) external view returns (uint256[] fightIds, uint8[] statuses)

function getFight(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId) external view returns (uint8 status, uint8 winner, uint8 method, uint256 bonusPool, uint256 originalPool, uint256 sumWinnersStakes, uint256 winningPoolTotalShares, uint256 pointsForWinner, uint256 pointsForWinnerMethod, uint256 claimedAmount, uint256 boostCutoff, bool cancelled)
function totalPool(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId) external view returns (uint256)

function getUserBoosts(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId, address user) external view returns (tuple(address user, uint256 amount, uint8 predictedWinner, uint8 predictedMethod, bool claimed)[] memory)
function getUserBoostIndices(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId, address user) external view returns (uint256[] memory indices)
function quoteClaimable(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId, address user, bool enforceDeadline) external view returns (uint256 totalClaimable)
function placeBoosts(string calldata eventId, tuple(uint256 fightId, uint256 amount, uint8 predictedWinner, uint8 predictedMethod)[] inputs) external
function addToBoost(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId, uint256 boostIndex, uint256 additionalAmount) external
function claimReward(string calldata eventId, uint256 fightId, uint256[] calldata boostIndices) external
function claimRewards(string calldata eventId, tuple(uint256 fightId, uint256[] boostIndices)[] inputs) external

function calculateUserPoints(uint8 predictedWinner, uint8 predictedMethod, uint8 actualWinner, uint8 actualMethod, uint256 pointsForWinner, uint256 pointsForWinnerMethod) external pure returns (uint256 points)
function minBoostAmount() external view returns (uint256)
function maxFightsPerEvent() external view returns (uint256)
function maxBonusDeposit() external view returns (uint256)
function FP() external view returns (address)
function OPERATOR_ROLE() external pure returns (bytes32)
function DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE() external view returns (bytes32)
function hasRole(bytes32 role, address account) external view returns (bool)
function grantRole(bytes32 role, address account) external
event EventCreated(string indexed eventId, uint256 numFights, uint256 indexed seasonId)

event FightResultSubmitted(string indexed eventId, uint256 indexed fightId, uint8 indexed winner, uint8 method, uint256 pointsForWinner, uint256 pointsForWinnerMethod, uint256 sumWinnersStakes, uint256 winningPoolTotalShares)
event BonusDeposited(string indexed eventId, uint256 indexed fightId, address indexed manager, uint256 amount)
event FightBoostCutoffUpdated(string indexed eventId, uint256 indexed fightId, uint256 cutoff)
